item.description:
09-30-10 Canceled, due to lack of interest.

with Europeans in Boston via Facebook,
Organizer Arne Hessenbruch is OK to post the event on meetup!
The more merrier!!
Maia
781-718-6203

Time October 2 at 3:00pm - October 3 at 3:00pm

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Location Kerstin's house and former church
Mill Hill Rd
South Waterford, ME

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created By Europeans in Boston

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More Info Please join us for a weekend of fun in Maine!
Tickets here: http://eibmainefall20...

Kerstin's house will be our command center for the weekend (http://www.homeaway.c.... We have several outdoor grills and a full kitchen in case of poor weather. The address is 10 Mill Hill Rd in South Waterford, Maine. (3hrs from Boston)

...Right next to Kerstin's house is the former church where we will have the party.

These two buildings, Kerstin's house and the church are where Mill Hill Rd meets Waterford Rd (Rte 35 and Rte 37).

Rebecca's house is also in S. Waterford but about 1 mile from Kerstin's house, so you need transport between the two! Come to Kerstin's house and you will receive directions to Rebecca's.

Schedule:
Sat 3pm: arrival and welcome (announced by ringing of church bell)
Sat 3-6pm: Kayaking on Keoka Lake / or alternatively hiking
Sat 6-8pm: Outdoor grilling at Kerstin's house (indoor cooking if weather is poor, announced by ringing of church bell)
Sat 8pm: Party at the church with music and dance (announced by ringing of church bell)
Sat 11pm: More ringing of church bell, just for the fun of it
Sun 8am-11am: breakfast at Kerstin's house
Sun noon: checking out
Sun noon-3pm: kayaking on Keoka Lake or hiking, or just hanging with friends at the church / Kerstin's house

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Maine weekend
